name: UselessFacts
0:
”Alexa open useless fact beta”
”Alexa launch useless fact beta”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: useless fact beta
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Impress other people by knowing a useless fact!

Useless Facts provides fun anyone can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch useless fact beta" or "Alexa, open useless fact beta" to get a useless fact.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
